title: Looking for peeps to play with
body:
Hey guys so I have been gone for like 4-5 months. ended the season at gold last season and just looking for some fun peeps with skype to play some norms with to get back into the flow of things. Currently looking at re-learning top or jungle this season and working out a champ pool for that. 

Thanks friends!!!

replies.body: Yeah hit me up. Ill probably only play with you if you're over 17 or something. Its hard to concentrate with squeakers coming through the call. >.<
